price: 78. Béni soit le Nom de ton Seigneur, à la Majesté Suprême, à l’Infinie Noblesse.
arabic: تَبَٰرَكَ ٱسۡمُ رَبِّكَ ذِي ٱلۡجَلَٰلِ وَٱلۡإِكۡرَامِ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: tabāraka us'mu rabbika dhī al-jalāli wal-ik'rāmi
